# get-stream

> Get a stream as a string, buffer, or array

## Install

```
$ npm install get-stream
```

## Usage

```js
const fs = require('fs');
const getStream = require('get-stream');

(async () => {
	const stream = fs.createReadStream('unicorn.txt');

	console.log(await getStream(stream));
	/*

	           __)))))))))))))),
	\|/       -\(((((''''((((((((.
	-*-==//////((''  .     `)))))),
	/|\      ))| o    ;-.    '(((((                                  ,(,
	         ( `|    /  )    ;
